name: chat-app-example
description: Demo chat application with React frontend and Node.js backend using polling

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.build:prod: npm run build && npm run build:check
scripts.build:check: node -e "const fs=require('fs'),path=require('path');const buildPath=path.join(__dirname,'client','build');if(!fs.existsSync(buildPath)||!fs.existsSync(path.join(buildPath,'index.html'))){console.error('❌ Frontend build failed or incomplete');process.exit(1);}console.log('✅ Frontend build verified');"
